messages.content: Over the last two years, we have been making positive and steady progress as a community; investing in local health services like Thornbury Hospital, securing £500,000 to kick start junction 18A into the M4, delivering superfast broadband to over 7,300 premises locally and fiercely fighting off unsustainable development. However, that progress is at risk.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investing in local health services like Thornbury Hospital.
Securing £500,000 to kick start junction 18A into the M4 and delivering superfast broadband to over 7,300 premises locally.

mentions.tacticalSituation: We live in a key constituency in deciding the outcome of the coming election.

issues.government: There has never been a Conservative majority Government without a Conservative MP here.
issues.health: Investing in local health services like Thornbury Hospital.
issues.transport: Securing £500,000 to kick start junction 18A into the M4.

community.content: Delivering superfast broadband to over 7,300 premises locally. Fiercely fighting off unsustainable development.

contactInformation.address: Luke Hall, 37 Sturmer Close, Yate, BS37 5UR

images.caption: Luke Hall, Parliamentary Candidate for South Gloucestershire

leaflet.additionalNotes: Having a Conservative MP here means we have real and proven influence in Government to get the best deal for our area.

examples: Securing £500,000 to kick start junction 18A into the M4

A loss of just six seats and the Government loses its majority
